Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.75396966 0.57367171 0.26614073 0.28044724 0.03677818 0.24988626
#>  [7] 0.13292313 0.43281319 0.11933493 0.72041084 0.46316762 0.57638280
#> [13] 0.59750274 0.56350345 0.76970176 0.91657046 0.93158446 0.34442573
#> [19] 0.60117110 0.96094294
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.17308529 0.56075156 0.78884926 0.95420877 0.59864391 0.68683327
#>  [7] 0.52296081 0.23541469 0.27022004 0.21058670 0.31552459 0.59870215
#> [13] 0.17163695 0.72996986 0.79441449 0.57133384 0.04533069 0.27400144
#> [19] 0.36379147 0.94246784

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.71204999 0.66367816 0.47172604 0.51857949 0.09466911 0.77000935
#>  [7] 0.52993040 0.93712127 0.46476925 0.66403815
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.4503463 0.2715541 0.6140358 0.9840723 0.9944067 0.7012559 0.3495052
#>  [8] 0.6018097 0.9927809 0.1827990
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.90385746 0.47045464 0.94918242 0.09779669 0.96205832 0.42358991
#>  [7] 0.82996005 0.60690033 0.39297178 0.39015992

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.5887331 0.5494841 0.4641492 0.7663785 0.5706087
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.49574818 0.50509173 0.67518155 0.54968216 0.01309031
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.09885447 0.75088076 0.52185200 0.27831274 0.48384758
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.9160091 0.2239916 0.2829160 0.9997457 0.7916235

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.0005328769 0.8309676812 0.8079768091 0.7124475350 0.6787623966
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.9191804 0.8467297 0.7298802 0.3875894 0.5131432
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.51694211 0.33956015 0.02708743 0.68561741 0.39613577
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.7299818 0.0479429 0.7030017 0.5057126 0.2752363

mclapply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(
    parallel::mclapply,
    X=1:4,
    mc.cores = 2)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.85319519 0.98192362 0.04428175 0.84048755 0.29379104
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.3687962 0.9949268 0.1296106 0.1601369 0.6691706
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.3003017 0.8217514 0.1087198 0.7402278 0.8800107
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.53696503 0.08216045 0.75392945 0.03272187 0.29409706

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.9         3.2          4.8         1.8 versicolor
#> 2          5.6         3.0          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 3          6.2         2.9          4.3         1.3 versicolor
#> 4          6.1         2.6          5.6         1.4  virginica
#> 5          6.7         2.5          5.8         1.8  virginica
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          4.6         3.6          1.0         0.2     setosa
#> 2          6.9         3.2          5.7         2.3  virginica
#> 3          5.8         2.6          4.0         1.2 versicolor
#> 4          6.1         3.0          4.9         1.8  virginica
#> 5          5.1         3.3          1.7         0.5     setosa
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          7.0         3.2          4.7         1.4 versicolor
#> 2          6.8         3.0          5.5         2.1  virginica
#> 3          6.3         3.3          6.0         2.5  virginica
#> 4          5.0         3.4          1.6         0.4     setosa
#> 5          5.0         3.6          1.4         0.2     setosa

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           5.8         4.0
#> 2           6.0         3.0
#> 3           6.7         3.1
#> 4           5.4         3.9
#> 5           5.0         3.5
#> 6           5.2         2.7
#> 7           6.7         3.0
#> 8           6.3         3.3
#> 9           4.6         3.4
#> 10          5.1         3.5
#> 11          4.9         2.5
#> 12          7.2         3.0
#> 13          5.2         4.1
#> 14          5.8         2.7
#> 15          5.2         3.5
#> 16          5.5         4.2
#> 17          5.4         3.4
#> 18          7.2         3.2
#> 19          6.0         2.9
#> 20          6.2         3.4

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.4         3.7
#> 2          6.8         2.8
#> 3          5.1         3.4
#> 4          5.1         2.5
#> 5          5.5         2.3
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.3         3.4
#> 2          5.6         2.7
#> 3          6.0         2.9
#> 4          5.1         3.5
#> 5          7.4         2.8
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          4.7         3.2
#> 2          5.8         2.7
#> 3          5.0         2.3
#> 4          6.3         3.3
#> 5          6.1         2.9
